metadata.title: PM condoles with Prince Rahim Aga Khan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 06 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif condoled with Prince Rahim Aga Khan on the passing of His Highness Aga Khan. In a post on X on Thursday, he said, "Spoke to Prince Rahim Aga Khan to express my deepest condolences on the passing of His Highness the Aga Khan IV. A true friend of Pakistan, he illuminated many lives with his visionary leadership, and his contributions to global development, education, health and humanitarian efforts will always be remembered."
